titleStmt.title: An account of the late action of the New-Englanders under the command of Sir William Phips against the French at Canada sent in a letter from Major Thomas Savage of Boston in New-England (who was present at the action) to his brother Mr. Perez Savage in London : together with the articles of war composed and agreed upon for that purpose.
titleStmt.author: Savage, Thomas, 1640-1705.

titleStmt.title: An account of the late action of the New-Englanders under the command of Sir William Phips against the French at Canada sent in a letter from Major Thomas Savage of Boston in New-England (who was present at the action) to his brother Mr. Perez Savage in London : together with the articles of war composed and agreed upon for that purpose.
titleStmt.author: Savage, Thomas, 1640-1705.

notesStmt.note: "This indented bill of ten shillings ...", p. [1] at end.
